title: Tunisian chakchouka
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '1 pepper, thinly sliced (any colour)', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste', '450g chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped, or to taste', '4 eggs']
